title: Visual Non-Verbal Reasoning
description: Visual pattern recognition and logical reasoning using shapes, symbols, and patterns

questions.question:

What comes next?

Study this sequence: ◼ ◼ ◻ ◼ ◼ ◻ ◼ ◼ ?

What should replace the question mark?

[2] [4] [8] [16] [?]

(● = filled circle, ◐ = half-filled circle, ○ = empty circle)

What comes next?

□ ■ □
